channel.title: Burgerninja Guide nearly completed
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Burgerninja Guide nearly completed"

item.title: Re: Burgerninja Guide nearly completed
item.content:encoded: Looking nice so far. Gonna be fun when the rest of it is released :).

item.title: Burgerninja Guide nearly completed
item.content:encoded:
Well, the guide that I started (and that MariScarlet was gracious enough to contribute to) is just about complete.

http://bvs.wikidot.com/guide:burgerninja

There's a still a bit more Info that needs to be added, but I'm continuing to work on it.
